column4: Hello, can anyone help me get Boxee running on Karmic 64 bit?  When I try to open it the screen goes black for a second with a cursor then it goes back to normal.  There's a little thing in my taskbar that says "starting Boxee" or something like that and then it goes away.
you'll get more info if you start it form the command line

just from the looks of that, i don't think i have any clue whatsoever. but use pastebin. describe a little about your problem on one line, and include your pastebin link that has the error messages in your post to the channel
ok. you probably won't get an answer for quite a while. just keep asking like every 5-10 minutes. good luck!
